section.section:
An applicant for a pinball machine license shall pay to the clerk a license fee of:
$10 for each free-play pinball machine in Caroline County, Kent County, or Queen Anne's County; or
$20 for each free-play pinball machine in Baltimore City, Baltimore County, Dorchester County, Harford County, Montgomery County, or Talbot County.

An applicant for a console machine license shall pay to the clerk a license fee of:
$25 for each free-play console machine in Caroline County, Kent County, or Queen Anne's County; or
$35 for each free-play console machine in Baltimore City, Baltimore County, Dorchester County, Harford County, or Talbot County.
Baltimore City, Baltimore County, and Harford County may impose fees in addition to the license fee required under subsection (a) of this section.

In Harford County:
an applicant for a pinball machine license shall pay an additional fee of $20 for each free-play pinball machine; and
an applicant for a console machine license shall pay an additional fee of $35 for each free-play console machine.

text.section: The license fee shall be prorated monthly.
All money collected under Part II of this subtitle shall be paid into the general fund of the county where it is collected.
